subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=|rs=魚11}}

# [[eel]]

subSections.title: Readings
Etymology 1
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|y=k|むなぎ}}

subSections.title: Noun
Etymology 2
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|y=k|うなぎ|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|うなぎ|ウナギ}}

# [[eel]], especially the [[Japanese eel]] (''{{w|Japanese eel|Anguilla japonica}}'')

subSections.title: Derived terms
See also
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|穴%子|アナ%ゴ|[[conger eel]]}}
* {{ja-r|鱓|ウツボ|[[moray eel]]}}

subSections.title: Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|うな|yomi=irr}}
Abbreviation of ''unagi'' above, used in some compounds.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|y=irr|うな|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|うな}}

# ''Synonym of'' {{ja-l||うなぎ}} ''above''.

subSections.title: Derived terms
Etymology 4
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|う|yomi=irr}}
Another abbreviation of ''unagi'' above, used in some compounds.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|y=irr|う|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|う}}

# ''Synonym of'' {{ja-l||うなぎ}} ''above''.

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: * Found in restaurant signboards, for example.
